name: Oh Fuck, Taxi
description:
DOWNLOADING RECOMMENDED FOR OPTIMAL DRIFTING EXPERIENCE.

Oh fuck!

You forgot to pick up your daughter from school. And your wife is threatening to divorce you, and then murder you, if you don't pick her up within 8 minutes!

Fuck!

Better drift your way there in "Oh Fuck, Taxi"!

Controls: 

WASD/Arrow Keys

Press escape to reset if stuck!

Can you beat the game dev's time? DrDrub beat the game in 2 minutes and 10 seconds.
